tuv.seg: Checklist when applying for Jobseeker's Benefit
Seicliosta nuair atá iarratas á dhéanamh ar Shochar Cuardaitheora Poist
When you apply for Jobseeker’s Benefit you must bring certain documents with you
Nuair a dhéantar iarratas ar Shochar Cuardaitheora Poist, caithfidh tú doiciméid áirithe a thabhairt leat
If you lose your job or are made redundant
Má chailltear post nó má dhéantar iomarcach tú
If you lose your job or are made redundant you should bring your P45 or a letter from your employer confirming the last day you worked
Má chailltear post nó má dhéantar iomarcach tú, ba chóir duit do P45 nó litir ón bhfostóir a thabhairt leat a dhearbhaíonn an lá deiridh a d'oibrigh tú
If you don’t have your P45 or a letter from your employer you should still apply
Mura bhfuil do P45 nó litir ón bhfostóir agat, ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh mar sin féin
However, it is important to bring either your P45 or a letter from your employer as soon as possible to your Intreo Centre or local Social Welfare Branch Office
Mar sin féin, tá sé tábhachtach do P45 nó litir ó d'fhostóir a thabhairt chuig an Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh Áitiúil chomh luath agus is féidir
If you have difficulty getting your P45 from your employer tell the member of staff dealing with your claim at your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office
Má tá deacracht agat ag fáil do P45 ón bhfostóir, inis do bhall foirne atá ag déileáil le d'éileamh san Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh Áitiúil (féach ‘Mura bhfuil do P45 agat thíos)
If you are made redundant you will also need to bring documentation showing how much redundancy you have received
Má dhéantar iomarcach tú, caithfidh tú doiciméid a thabhairt leat a léiríonn an méid iomarcaíochta tugtha duit
If you are getting more than statutory redundancy you should bring a letter from your employer stating how much redundancy you have been given
Má fuair tú níos mó ná iomarcaíocht reachtúil, caithfidh tú litir ó d’fhostóir a thabhairt leat a sonraíonn an méid iomarcaíochta tugtha duit
If your claim for redundancy hasn’t yet been settled you should still apply for Jobseeker’s Benefit
Mura mbíonn d’éileamh iomarcaíochta socraithe fós, ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Cuardaitheora Poist
When you get your redundancy payment you must inform your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office
Nuair gheobhaidh tú d’íocaíocht iomarcaíochta, ní mór duit cur in iúl d’Oifig Leasa Shóisialaigh Áitiúil
Find out more about your rights to redundancy payments
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil maidir le do chearta ar íocaíochtaí iomarcaíochta
If you are laid off
Má dhéantar tú a leagan as
If you are laid off temporarily, you may or may not get a P45
Má dhéantar tú a leagan as go sealadach, b'fhéidir go bhfaighfeá nó nach bhfaighfeá P45
If you don’t have a P45 you must bring a letter from your employer stating the following:
Mura bhfuil P45 agat, caithfidh tú litir ón bhfostóir a thabhairt a thugann na sonraí a leanas:
• You have been laid off work without pay
• Má dhéantar tú a leagan as gan phá
• The last day you worked
• An lá deiridh a d'oibrigh tú
• The reason for the lay off
• An chúis leis an leagan as
• How long he or she expects you will be laid off
• Cé chomh fada a shíleann sé/sí a mhairfidh do leagan as
If your days of work are reduced
Má dhéantar do laethanta oibre a laghdú
If your days of work are reduced you must bring a letter from you employer stating the following:
Má laghdaítear do laethanta oibre, caithfidh tú litir a thabhairt ón bhfostóir a thugann na sonraí a leanas:
• Your days at work have been reduced on a temporary basis
• Go bhfuil do laethanta oibre laghdaithe ar bhonn sealadach
• The number of days you worked each week
• An líon laethanta a d'oibrigh tú gach seachtain
• The number of days you now work each week
• An líon laethanta a oibríonn tú gach seachtain anois
• The reduction in your pay
• An laghdú pá atá agat
You will also need to bring the following documents and information with you:
Caithfidh tú na doiciméid agus an t-eolas a leanas a thabhairt leat chomh maith:
• Your Public Services Card (if you don't have one you will be asked to register for one when applying for Jobseeker's Benefit)
• Do Cárta Seirbhísí Poiblí
• Your Personal Public Service Number
• Do Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí
• Details of your availability for work and any efforts you have made to get work
• Sonraí faoi d'infhaighteacht le haghaidh fostaíochta agus na hiarrachtaí atá déanta agat chun obair a fháil
For example, letters you have written to employers and any responses you have received
Mar shampla, litreacha atá scríofa agat chuig fostóirí agus na freagraí a fuarthas
• Details of your spouse/partner's income (if any)
• Sonraí ioncaim do chéile nó páirtí (mar is cuí)
• Details of your dependent children
• Sonraí do leanaí cleithiúnacha
This is a form you will receive from your last employer detailing tax/PRSI paid to date in the current tax year
Is é atá anseo ná foirm a gheobhaidh tú ó d’fhostóir deireanach ag tabhairt sonraí na cánach/an ÁSPC atá íoctha go dtí seo sa bhliain chánach reatha
You must either bring it on the date of your claim or (if unable to do so), to bring it in on the next day of attendance
Ní mór duit é a thabhairt isteach ar lá d’éilimh nó (mura féidir leat é sin a dhéanamh), é a thabhairt isteach ar an gcéad lá eile a mbeidh tú i láthair
Find out what you can do if your employer will not give you a P45
Faigh amach cad is féidir leat a dhéanamh mura dtabharfaidh d’fhostóir P45 duit
This is a form given to you each year by your employer
Is foirm é seo a thugann d’fhostóir duit gach bliain
It details your pay and tax paid for the relevant year
Tugann sé sonraí faoi do phá agus faoin gcáin atá íoctha don bhliain ábhartha
Find out what you can do if you do not get aP60 from your employer
Faigh amach cad is féidir leat a dhéanamh mura bhfaigheann tú foirm P60 ó d’fhostóir
• Proof of your identity - see below for more information
• Cruthúnas céannachta (féach thíos chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil)
• Proof of address - see below for more information
• Cruthúnas seolta (féach thíos chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil)
You can provide evidence of your identity by showing your passport or your driver's licence
Is féidir leat fianaise ar chéannacht a sholáthar trí do phas nó do cheadúnas tiomána a thaispeáint
If you do not have either a passport or driver’s licence, you should bring any other document that you may have, particularly one that has your photograph on it
Mura bhfuil pas nó ceadúnas tiomána agat, ba chóir duit aon doiciméad eile atá agat a thabhairt isteach, go háirithe ceann a bhfuil grianghraf díot air
The following documents may also be acceptable: credit card, debit card, medical card, age ID card, work ID card, club membership card
D’fhéadfaí glacadh leis na doiciméid seo a leanas freisin: cárta creidmheasa, cárta dochair, cárta leighis, cárta aitheantais aoise, cárta aitheantais oibre, cárta ballraíochta club
The following items are not accepted as proof of identity:
Níl na nithe seo a leanas inghlactha mar chruthúnas céannachta:
• Birth or baptismal certificates
• Deimhnithe baiste nó breithe
• Bills or personal letters
• Billí nó litreacha pearsanta
A claim cannot be decided until identity has been proven
Ní féidir cinneadh a dhéanamh faoi éileamh gan chruthúnas céannachta
You may be asked to show evidence of your address
D'fhéadfaí iarraidh ort fianaise ar do sheoladh a thaispeáint
You should bring any of the following documents:
Ba chóir duit ceann ar bith de na doiciméid seo a leanas a thabhairt isteach:
• Recent bills from utility companies such as electricity, telephone (landline or mobile), gas, cable television, waste charges etc
• Billí le déanaí ó chuideachtaí fóntais cosúil le leictreachas, teileafón (líne talún nó fón póca), gás, teilifís chábla, táillí dramhaíola srl
• Recent statements/letters from banks, building societies, credit unions, credit card companies or other financial institutions
• Ráitis/litreacha le déanaí ó bhainc, chumainn foirgníochta, chomhair chreidmheasa, chuideachtaí cárta creidmheasa nó institiúidí airgeadais eile
• Recent letters addressed to you from insurance companies, local authorities, government departments or the Revenue Commissioners
• Litreacha a seoladh chugat le déanaí ó chuideachtaí árachais, údaráis áitiúla, ranna rialtais nó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim
• Local authority rent book, mortgage or leasing agreement
• Leabhar cíosa údaráis áitiúil, morgáiste nó comhaontú léasaithe
Note: a recent document is one issued within the last 2 months
Tabhair faoi deara: is é atá i gceist le doiciméad le déanaí ná ceann a eisíodh le 2 mhí anuas
All documents must be originals, not photocopies
Caithfidh na doiciméid go léir a bheith ina mbunchóipeanna, ní ghlacfar le fótachóipeanna
If there is doubt about your address, the Jobseeker's Benefit claim is not paid until your address is verified
Má tá amhras ar bith faoi do sheoladh, ní dhámhfar an t-éileamh ar Shochar do Lucht Cuardaigh Fostaíochta le haghaidh íocaíochta go dtí go ndéanfar do sheoladh a dhearbhú
